p: Various blood cell counts and the ratios between them, such as neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio (NLR) and platelet-to-lymphocyte ratio (PLR) could be used as predictive biomarkers in several types of cancer, including breast cancer. [ 1, 8, 9] The research conducted by Lee et al in 2019 suggests that low NLR at baseline is associated with a better overall survival in TNBC patients. [ 1]
